title: Syndra too stronk
body: She needs a dmg nerf. I'm seeing her in all my games lately and she's just wrecking everything with ease. Her Q was chunking half my hp bar as Yi at lvl 5. Just Q's me twice and i die....that shouldnt be allowed.

replies.body: shes fine. according to champion.gg she is perfectly balanced. https://champion.gg/champion/Syndra/Middle

you do realize his point was level 5 she was destroying him? which at most she would have had a NLR not a full build. if you're gonna comment at least read the original post so you don't look like a moron who's trying to act like they know what they are talking about.

Exactly. This dude was taking her full final build into account, which is not what i was talking about. Ive also only played yi maybe 5 times before to begin with. I wasnt expecting his low dmg output early on

Well my bad. Though I can't check the overall match on what items where built when. Especially when I look it up with [Op.gg](http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=LastBreathX). If I had the actual match history maybe I could pull more infomation. But with op.gg its pretty lacking since its not a ranked game. Maybe I could try checking Replay.gg and see if the match was recorded but that takes some time.
a yi gets deleted in game      good lol     her damage is fine you are squishy
